abstract: For the first time, Accel Partners has moved into late-stage investing.
snippet: For the first time, Accel Partners has moved into late-stage investing.
lead_paragraph: Who says that money is tight for venture capitalists? Accel Partners, the Palo Alto, Calif., venture capital firm behind companies like Facebook, Glam Media and MetroPCS, announced Thursday that it had raised two new funds for a total of $1 billion.

headline.main: What Recession? Accel Partners Raises $1 Billion
